backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, vehicles, notifications, invite codes, and admin authorization using multiple mixins and internal maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs with high-level metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with short descriptions summarizing their functionality and roles in the application.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and hook rules with project-specific warnings and ignored patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier formatting configuration specifying style rules like print width, quotes, and trailing commas.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Defines protected interfaces and mandatory rules for modifying routes, authentication, backend APIs, and data structures.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog documenting versioned changes, new features, and protected interfaces.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script running all frontend quality gate checks via npm for CI automation.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the PWA manifest, icons, and main React script.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull‑request checklist enforcing change‑control, quality gates, testing steps, and documentation updates.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring metadata, icons, theme colors, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache strategies for static assets and navigation requests.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation for automated quality‑gate checks including linting, formatting, typechecking, and tests.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Developer guide explaining how to follow the project's change‑control system during development.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation describing the project's semantic versioning process and release update rules.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, routes, and theme provider for the main React application.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI for access-denied state with optional admin-claim flow and profile input form.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Displays detailed profile-load error diagnostics with backend health checks and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in UI using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Error screen handling bootstrap failures with retry logic, backend health checks, and copy-to-clipboard details.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the app logo with adjustable sizing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper showing header/footer based on authentication and routing.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog allowing users to report a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with notes.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for submitting a report when a previously lost vehicle is found.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with user menu, links, and dynamic admin access.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches top-level render errors and shows a fallback UI.
UI fallback displayed when a critical error occurs, offering a reload option.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Component to initiate a vehicle transfer using PIN verification and produce a shareable transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: PIN entry dialog with validation, error display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap errors and manages bounded and continuous retry logic with timers.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-related hooks for checking admin status, onboarding the first admin, and fetching admin-only data.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend health anonymously and reports reachability and diagnostic info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Hooks for fetching lost vehicles and marking vehicles as lost, stolen, pawned, or found.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hooks to fetch user notifications and mark them as read with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Mutation hook to complete user onboarding using an invite token.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Hooks for setting up and updating the user's PIN.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile with identity-aware caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Provides mutations for initiating and accepting vehicle transfers, invalidating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Defines a mutation that checks a vehicle's status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Implements queries and mutations for fetching user vehicles, fetching a single vehicle, and registering a new one with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an informational page describing the app, features, and admin contact details.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Form page for accepting vehicle transfers using a transfer code, handling submission and errors.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system stats, admin verification handling, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Allows admins to view, generate, and manage invite tokens with copy and status features.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user stats, quick actions, and links based on vehicles, reports, notifications, and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Displays and filters a list of reported lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with status badges and details.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays a list of user notifications, allows marking items as read, and shows loading or empty states.
Handles invite-based onboarding with admin checks, form submission, and validation for creating a user profile.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the user's profile with form handling, save actions, and logout support.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a new vehicle, upload a photo with progress tracking, and submit vehicle data.
Manages PIN setup and updates with validation and separate flows for initial creation and modification.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Checks a vehicle's status by engine number and displays results with status badges, error handling, and vehicle details.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a vehicle, including status badges, owner actions, and lost/stolen report details.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Shows the user's vehicle list with status badges and provides navigation to register or view vehicles.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Controls authentication, profile loading, admin bypass logic, and actor bootstrap flows before showing the app.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Provides a proxy wrapper around backend actors to safely handle admin initialization and prevent startup failures.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Creates consistent React Query keys for actor-related queries.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Defines and checks allowlisted admin principals for onboarding bypass.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Provides utilities to detect canister-stopped errors, extract technical error messages, and classify bootstrap errors with appropriate guidance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters, including persistence in sessionStorage and hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the app’s version and build date constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, breakpoints, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, and issues focused on improving invite-token onboarding UX and session persistence.
